titleInfo.title: Medinet Abou Ruines du Grand Temple Ouest

mods.abstract: Hypostyle Hall, Temple of Rameses III at Medinet Habu (New Kingdom Dynasty XX); ruined hypostyle hall with inscribed bases of columns, three Egyptian men, and storerooms (foreground) remains of pylon (background); "No. 122 Medinet Abou Ruines du Grand Temple , Ouest ) H. Bechard" in white along bottom of print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

subject.topic: Temple of Ramses III (Medinet Habu Site, Egypt)

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture
